He Xi Long

Korean: 허시롱

Hometown:

Chengdu, Sichuan

China

Full name:
He Xi Long
Native name:
何禧龙
Birthday:
Aug 8, 2000
Age:
24 years old

Introduction

He Xi Long is a Chinese trainee under Stardust Entertainment. He is a member of the pre-debut Chinese boy group, Stardust Boys. He gained recognition as a contestant on the survival show Starlight Boys.
